p: This work was supported by grants from the National Key Research and Development Program Projects of China (No. 2017YFD0500305), the National Key Program for Infectious Disease of China (No. 2018ZX10101002-002), the State Key Program of National Natural Science of China (No. U1808202), Guangdong Province Key Area R & D Plan Project (No. 2018B020241002), and the Guangdong Provincial Science and Technology Project (No. 2018B020207013).
